Description:
Designing and implementing new network (Wired / Wireless) solutions and/or improving the efficiency of current networks (Wired / Wireless)
Troubleshoot Wireless LAN networks to quickly resolve and minimize downtime and outages.
Devise, plan, deploy, and improve wireless networks from the beginning to implementation by collaborating with vendors
Installing, configuring and supporting network equipment including routers, switches, WAN accelerators, Wireless Controller, DNS and DHCP
Maximizing network performance through ongoing monitoring and troubleshooting
Arranging scheduled upgrades
Investigating faults in the network
Updating network equipment to the latest firmware releases
Reporting network status to key stakeholders
Review HLD, LLD, BOQ and attend technical discussions with Vendors to optimize the setup of various network projects
Provision new services, configure CRs and troubleshoot on different types of network, security and datacenter devices on multiple vendors’ equipment’s. Develop Impact analysis, Rollout plan and Rollback plan for all network activities
Review Configuration Templates before applying it on Core Network DevicesSkills
Skills:
Hands on L2 Network (STP, Port channel, VPC, stacking, VSS, HSRP, VRRP)
Hands on Routing (OSPF, EIGRP, RIP, BGP)
Hands on Wireless network design, implementation \
Hands on Cisco controller / AP configuration
Ability to do wireless survey and conclude heat mapping
Skills for Cisco ISE
Skills for Firewalls
Skills for Guest Captive Portal Solutions like Ipera, AntiLabs and Nomadix
Skills for Hyper location tracking systems
Experience in managing Robots through Wi-Fi
Wireless analysis abilities
